properties.name: firebase.enabled
properties.description: Enable Firebase Admin SDK initialization when set to true.

properties.name: firebase.credentials.location
properties.description: Absolute path to the Firebase service account credentials JSON file.

properties.name: firebase.credentials.json
properties.description: Firebase service account credentials as a JSON string (alternative to file-based credentials).

properties.name: firebase.database.url
properties.description: Firebase Realtime Database URL to associate with the Admin SDK instance.

properties.name: firebase.vapid.public-key
properties.description: VAPID public key for Web Push Notifications.

properties.name: firebase.vapid.private-key
properties.description: VAPID private key for Web Push Notifications.
